Description: Rest on flight into Egypt, with two angels flanking Virgin and adoring Christ Child lying in his mother's lap; on the left St Joseph standing next to donkey drinking in a river; within oval Etching
Curator's comments: The plate is not described in Robert-Dumesnil or in IFF; however, Mariette, who owned the copper plate, mentions it in his 'Notes Manuscrites'. See cat. exhib. 'Sébastien Bourdon' (Paris, 2000), No.104
Acquisition notes: No indication of provenance on the verso
